title: How to Block a Number on ATT

parts.name: If you have an iPhone with iOS7

steps.headline: If you have an iPhone, with iOS7 or newer, you can block the number from the iPhone.
For older iPhones and other phones, proceed to the following paragraphs.

parts.name: Join the Do Not Call Registry

steps.headline: Call the US Do Not Call registry service using the number that you would like to block from telemarketers.
Follow the prompts to register for the service.
steps.description: The registry will pick up your cellular phone number automatically, but you may be asked to answer some questions regarding your number.

steps.headline: Wait 31 days for the number to be added to the registry.
Ask telemarketers to remove your name and number from their list immediately.
steps.description: This may take care of the problem.

steps.headline: Ask them their business name and number, if you still receive calls.
steps.description: They are now in violation of the Do Not Call Act.

steps.headline: Register a complaint with the Do Not Call service at donotcall.gov/complaint/complaintcheck.aspx.
steps.description: Telemarketers in violation of the Act can be fined.

steps.headline: Go to http://www.att.net/smartcontrols-SmartLimitsForWireless.
steps.description: You can also search for "Smart Limits for Wireless" in the search bar at att.com.

steps.headline: Click the "Order Now" button on the right side of the page.
steps.description: It is free for 90 days, then it is $4.99 per month per mobile phone on the account.

steps.headline: Login to your AT&T Wireless Account when prompted.
steps.description: You will need to have the right login and the rights to make changes on the account to order Smart Limits. You can also go to an AT&T Wireless store with a copy of your latest bill or call the AT&T customer service number with your account number.

steps.headline: Find the mobile phone that needs numbers to be blocked.
Click on the "Wireless" tab, if you are not prompted to the screen to order Smart Limits on your phone.
Select the phone that you want Smart Limits to be added to.
steps.description: Specify any more information as prompted until the transaction is complete.

steps.headline: Manage Smart Limits under your Wireless account.
steps.description: Type in up to 30 numbers to block from calling or texting your phone. You can also use other features with Smart Limits, such as controlling Internet browsing time, the number of texts the phone can use and limiting purchases from the account.

text: If you have an iPhone with iOS7 If you have an iPhone, with iOS7 or newer, you can block the number from the iPhone.  For older iPhones and other phones, proceed to the following paragraphs.  Join the Do Not Call Registry Call the US Do Not Call registry service using the number that you would like to block from telemarketers. The number is (888) 382-1222. Follow the prompts to register for the service. The registry will pick up your cellular phone number automatically, but you may be asked to answer some questions regarding your number. Wait 31 days for the number to be added to the registry.  Ask telemarketers to remove your name and number from their list immediately. This may take care of the problem. Ask them their business name and number, if you still receive calls. They are now in violation of the Do Not Call Act. Register a complaint with the Do Not Call service at donotcall.gov/complaint/complaintcheck.aspx. Telemarketers in violation of the Act can be fined. Purchase AT&T Smart Limits Go to http://www.att.net/smartcontrols-SmartLimitsForWireless. You can also search for "Smart Limits for Wireless" in the search bar at att.com. Click the "Order Now" button on the right side of the page. It is free for 90 days, then it is $4.99 per month per mobile phone on the account. Login to your AT&T Wireless Account when prompted. You will need to have the right login and the rights to make changes on the account to order Smart Limits. You can also go to an AT&T Wireless store with a copy of your latest bill or call the AT&T customer service number with your account number. Find the mobile phone that needs numbers to be blocked.  Click on the "Wireless" tab, if you are not prompted to the screen to order Smart Limits on your phone.  Select the phone that you want Smart Limits to be added to. Specify any more information as prompted until the transaction is complete. Manage Smart Limits under your Wireless account. Type in up to 30 numbers to block from calling or texting your phone. You can also use other features with Smart Limits, such as controlling Internet browsing time, the number of texts the phone can use and limiting purchases from the account.
sentences: If you have an iPhone with iOS7 If you have an iPhone, with iOS7 or newer, you can block the number from the iPhone.
For older iPhones and other phones, proceed to the following paragraphs.
Join the Do Not Call Registry Call the US Do Not Call registry service using the number that you would like to block from telemarketers.
The number is (888) 382-1222.
Follow the prompts to register for the service.
The registry will pick up your cellular phone number automatically, but you may be asked to answer some questions regarding your number.
Wait 31 days for the number to be added to the registry.
Ask telemarketers to remove your name and number from their list immediately.
This may take care of the problem.
Ask them their business name and number, if you still receive calls.
They are now in violation of the Do Not Call Act.
Register a complaint with the Do Not Call service at donotcall.gov/complaint/complaintcheck.aspx.
Telemarketers in violation of the Act can be fined.
Purchase AT&T Smart Limits Go to http://www.att.net/smartcontrols-SmartLimitsForWireless.
You can also search for "Smart Limits for Wireless" in the search bar at att.com.
Click the "Order Now" button on the right side of the page.
It is free for 90 days, then it is $4.99 per month per mobile phone on the account.
Login to your AT&T Wireless Account when prompted.
You will need to have the right login and the rights to make changes on the account to order Smart Limits.
You can also go to an AT&T Wireless store with a copy of your latest bill or call the AT&T customer service number with your account number.
Find the mobile phone that needs numbers to be blocked.
Click on the "Wireless" tab, if you are not prompted to the screen to order Smart Limits on your phone.
Select the phone that you want Smart Limits to be added to.
Specify any more information as prompted until the transaction is complete.
Manage Smart Limits under your Wireless account.
Type in up to 30 numbers to block from calling or texting your phone.
You can also use other features with Smart Limits, such as controlling Internet browsing time, the number of texts the phone can use and limiting purchases from the account.
